      • lowPass

        public float[] lowPass(float[] input,
                       float[] output)
        Modified low-pass filter. Implementation is discussed more in-depth in paper, but is designed to remove sensor noise.
        Parameters:
        input - raw data
        output - location to store new data/data from last pass
        Returns:
        output
